snippet: More than 40 people have fallen ill with E. coli food poisoning after eating at Chipotle Mexican Grill restaurants in six different states, federal health officials said on Friday, sending shares of the burrito chain to an 18-month low.
abstract: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says more than 40 people have been sickened by E coli food poisoning after eating at Chipotle Mexican Grill restaurants in six states.
lead_paragraph: More than 40 people have fallen ill with E. coli food poisoning after eating at Chipotle Mexican Grill restaurants in six different states, federal health officials said on Friday, sending shares of the burrito chain to an 18-month low.

headline.main: Chipotle E. Coli Outbreak Reaches Six States, Shares Tumble
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; E. Coli Linked to Chipotle Is Reported in 3 More States
